concept.title: Logs
concept.shortdesc: Log files are available to download log files for diagnostic purposes.

conbody.p: Navigate to the Download Logs page by selecting MonitoringDownload Logs from the Internet Scale Messaging user interface.
Log files available for download are the ismserver-connection log, and the ismserver-default log.
conbody.draft-comment: Are any other log files available? What information does each of these log files contain. Why would a customer choose to view a particular log file and what could they hope to understand from it.
